collection.name: eg_Assignment
collection.description:
Create a POSTMAN script which calls two APIs

http://postman-echo.com/get

And 

http://postman-echo.com/post

The script should generate a random number using JavaScript and pass it to the get api http://postman-echo.com/get?rand=<generated_number>

Read the same number from the JSON get response and save it to a postman variable


Pass this new variable to http://postman-echo.com/post and then print same back from the response JSON

detail.name: OK
detail.detail: Standard response for successful HTTP requests. The actual response will depend on the request method used. In a GET request, the response will contain an entity corresponding to the requested resource. In a POST request the response will contain an entity describing or containing the result of the action.
